name: import
title: Pathling Import Operation
description: This operation allows bulk NDJSON data to be imported into the server, making it available for query

parameter.name: source
parameter.documentation: A source FHIR NDJSON file containing resources to be included within this import operation. Each file must contain only one type of resource.

part.name: resourceType
part.documentation: The base FHIR resource type contained within this source file.

part.name: url
part.documentation: A URL that can be used to retrieve this source file.
